values: Been in this "Teacher" job for the past 6 months liao. It's both fun and relaxing ... the perfect job for a slacker. But then rite, how much slacking will it take for one to climb that ladder up high in the society ? Zero lor .. sad to say, success comes with a price tag and it aint ez at all. So I've been sending resume for hopping opportunities already. Heard from 2 companies so far, will be glad to have a few interviews before making the right decision actually. Currently, got this company interested in hiring me.... I went thru 2 interviews, saw 1 bitch, 1 nice lady, the Managing Director and 1 ah pu neh. Doesnt look easy to get into the company considering the number of rounds and the tests I had to go thru. Then rite, they still wan to negotiate on the compensation lor .. i think is ridiculous .. Do everything and then in the end only they can win, you are only the employee, so too bad for u, u lose. My dilemma now is whether to hop or stay on the current job la. Meantime, visit my website if u are reading this blog .. MassiveMess
http://redwander.livejournal.com/5053.html

Haiz .. upsetting conversations with Xxxx as usual. Wonder why I still keep it going when it seems near impossible for us to work out ... Did a school site, am satisfied with it except for the flash part, very cheesy. Anyway, this site showed me I have improved in layout, colours, HTML, programming and also my flash is still stagnant there. Enjoyed doing this project cuz it aint freelance or anything, juz part of the scope at work. Holidays coming to an end, means sian again ... everyday face boring pple and oso irritating kids. haiz ... life sux again.
http://redwander.livejournal.com/4809.html

If I ever get stranded on an island alone,
I'll jump on any ship that comes along ...
Be it a pirate ship or a ghost ship,
it makes no difference to me.

All I need is a sense of belonging,
belonging to someone is the only thing that I need and care about,
someone good or someone bad,
it doesnt matter to me...

Sometimes, even if it seems to everyone that I belong to somebody,
little does anyone know that,
deep down inside, 
I am still stranded in the same island,
feeling lonely and empty,

Maybe life is meant to be,
so empty and meaningless.

Passed my subject 6.01 WooHoo !!! 2 more lessons to go before the Traffic Police Assessment Lesson 7.01 will be at night though ...sian Cuz I can't U-turn properly yet Had my lunch at Tiong Bahru Kopitiam this afternoon, I think the mixed veg. rice sux, taste like stale lor And whilst walking to the bustop, saw some CheeNa Tong Zhi performing on stage Quite funny cuz they can arch their body and do amazing moves effortlessly Following that performance was a magic show performed by another CheeNa Tong Zhi The host introduced her as 'The Amazing Card Magician' or something in Mandarin And she must've hidden 10 decks of cards in her body or breast or armpit or wherever Cuz at one point, she was throwing the cards in the air non-stop ... quite fascinating For me, the hightlight of the act is definitely the host ... He looks like the typical Uncle-Uncle with curly-wurly hair ... And actually resembles those hosts at 'Hungry Ghost Festival' stage performance ... quite funny Last bit, as mentioned in last nite's entry, tis the 2nd animation I did together with and Alan... enjoy
click here for the animation

Everyday is a new beginning so they say ... Everyday seems the same to me ... *Sigh* .... Maybe I should get a new hobby apart from the current one I have i.e irritating people Mervyn knows well enough how good an irritant I can be if I want to ... haha ----------------------------------------------- When will I ever get that big break ... The chance that will propel me to a higher level in creativity ... *Sigh*... dunno ... Dunno dunno dunno dunno dunno dunno dunno dunno ... XXX's driving me crazy ... The more I think about it, the more I feel it's pointless to dwell on her craziness ... ------------------------------------------ Failed my subject 6.01 lesson today ... First time riding bike on the road ain't easy at all ... But it beats gettin' screamed over the phone by XXX and then insisting that I should rush home immediately with the car so that XXX can go to the vicinity and buy 4D. 4D, ya 4D rulez Big time !!! 4D can make the closest people around you turn against you ... Ask me, I've experienced that first hand ... ------------------------------------------------

I'm sick of hiding ... can we show our faces for once ?

Hm.. how shall I begin writing ? Err.. Shant dwell on where I m.i.a to  for the last 5 months , since I'm the sort who lives day by day....
Things have been changing and ever so fast, I find it hard to keep up most of the time.  Everybody's changing, they're never the same'ol fellas I used to know anymore.  Most are getting married...some even have children already.  To me, that's scary... yeah, I'm afraid to grow old with nobody around me.  It's saddening to imagine how sad life would be growing old with nobody telling you that ' everything's gonna be alright ... ' 
Feels so lost now ... dunno what lies ahead for me anymore ... totally clueless ...
http://redwander.livejournal.com/957.html

Didnt know that life gets worse after graduating from school.  Had I known earlier, I would have kept failing and secure my position in school forever... Now the purpose of living seemed to have changed.  It's always about ' who - makes - the - most - money ' before you die , and I always wonder what can that contribute to the "values" that teachers used to preach during school days. Realised that I've been talking to myself quite often these days. I don't think it is a good sign, think I'm becoming schizo soon.  I want to move out, I don't want to stay here anymore.  I'm want to move out with my hamster, PS II and all the games, my 3 computers, and all my new clothes. No job, no money.  Now, it is not even possible to go around taking photographs with my lomo-camera.  I pray to God sometimes, I wonder if he actually hears my prayer and answers them.
